underlying_goal: Fix real-time updates for images tab, fix image iteration to use selected version with feedback, and document future enhancement for post-content-aware image generation
friction_detail: The initial real-time update fix (query key correction) didn't resolve the issue - user reported it still wasn't working.
brief_summary: User needed fixes for real-time image updates, image iteration to respect selected version/feedback, and a spec update for future post-aware image generation; most tasks were addressed across backend and frontend with multi-file changes.
